scripts.dev: concurrently "sh .env.sh && cd backend && python -m flask --app app.main:app run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=5000" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:server: cd backend && python -m flask --app app.main:app run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=5000
scripts.preview: concurrently "cd backend && python -m flask --app app.main:app run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=5000" "cd frontend && npm i && npm run preview"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm i && npm run build
